entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 08:41 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 08:41 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
